about_the_game:
Contraverse is a premier destination for cinematic story-based virtual reality.


Break through the screen and enter further inside the movie than ever before. Contraverse brings together the best immersive cinematic experiences that will put you in the center of the action, standing shoulder to shoulder with the characters in the movies.

Watch new original content: Pawn, Broken Mirror, and Contravision, which put you into the body of the main character and make you feel what it’s like to experience the stories from the character’s perspective.

See and hear it all
• Immerse yourself in full 360-degree videos that put you at the center of the action
• Experience spatial audio, where depth and distance play a role depending on where you look

New content will be added regularly.

Minimum:
